categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: The Assassination on Ossus was an assassination attempt by Jor Torlin, a Sith Acolyte and operative of Sith Intelligence and Assassination, against Morrigan Corde, agent of Imperial Intelligence. After disrupting a meeting between Admiral Gar Stazi of the Galactic Alliance Remnant and Captain Mingo Bovark of the Empire-in-exile, the two agents went to Ossus to complete their mission to capture Cade Skywalker.

However, once on the planet's jungles, Torlin turned against Corde and attempted to kill her. Corde defended herself and then activated micro-ampule filled with a nerve toxin she had inserted on Torlin's body while he had been unconscious at The Wheel. After Torlin began to feel the effects of the toxin and collapsed, Corde left him to die in the middle of the jungle and left Ossus on Torlin's personal ship, the Raider.
